name: Workin for the Weekend
description:
Work has been stressful, but you just have to survive one more day before you take your all expense paid trip to Fiji!

Press any key or click to start, then click "GET TO WORK!" to begin. Click and drag papers into their proper bins while making sure to shred the papers the boss doesn't want to deal with.

The game has 4 "stages" and a winscreen. Completing it is challenging, but doable!

Workin for the Weekend was our submission for the Extra Credits game jam #6! The theme of the jam was "take care". We took it as self-care, so we made a game about keeping your stress low on your last day of work before vacation. 

This was our first time making a game at all, let alone during a jam. We had a lot of fun doing it and the jam inspired us to start a proper project together.

Sounds and music were gotten from zapsplat.com.
